resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/73522</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>73522</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40c87b29-e500-43c6-26db-5c0d5c2081ef#1#7</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Támpontok</string>
            <string language="en">bases</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterseiten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">bases</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">bases</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">basi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βάσεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">bases</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A kereszténység elterjedése, az egyház hierarchiája, szerzetesrendek kialakulása, teológia, zene. Szimbólumok és képi elbeszélés a korszak művészetében</string>
            <string language="en">spreading of christianity, the hierarchy of the church, forming of monk orders, theology, music. Symbols and picture narration in the art of the era..</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">korabizánci művészet,  kereszténység,  szimbólum,  </string>
            <string language="en">early byzantine art, christianity, symbol</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verbreiten des Christentums, die Hierarchie der 
Kirche, Formung der Mönchordnungen, Theologie, Musik. Symbole 
und Abbildung Erzählung in der kunst der Ära.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">propagation du christianisme, la hiérarchie de 
l'église, formation des commandes de moine, théologie, musique. 
Symboles et récit d'image dans l'art de l'ère.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">espalhar do christianity, a hierarquia da igreja,
dar forma de ordens do monk, theology, música. Símbolos e 
narration do retrato na arte da era.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">diffusione del christianity, la gerarchia della 
chiesa, formare degli ordini del monk, teologia, musica. Simboli
e narration dell'immagine nell'arte dell'era.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διάδοση του χριστιανισμού, η ιεραρχία της εκκλησίας, 
διαμόρφωση των κατατάξεων μοναχών, θεολογία, μουσική. 
Σύμβολα και αφήγηση εικόνων στην τέχνη της εποχής ..</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el separarse del cristianismo, la jerarquía de 
la iglesia, formación de las pedidos del monk, teología, música. 
Símbolos y narración del cuadro en el arte de la era.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">frühe byzantinische kunst, Christentum, Symbol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">art bizantin tôt, christianisme, symbole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">arte byzantine adiantada, christianity, símbolo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">arte byzantine iniziale, christianity, simbolo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πρόωρη βυζαντινή τέχνη, χριστιανισμός, σύμβολο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">arte byzantine temprano, cristianismo, símbolo</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-T-LRE">13-14</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>presentation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn:
org:Kossuth Kiadó Rt.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>73522</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=40c87b29-e500-43c6-26db-5c0d5c2081ef&v=1&b=7</uri>

  </manifestation>
</expression>
